description: This Kale Tabbouleh Salad is a healthy riff on traditional tabbouleh. Kale provides some heft, while chickpeas add protein and complement the bulgur to make this tabbouleh salad a complete meal.
name: Kale Tabbouleh Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 bunches parsley (about 160 grams / 5 oz leaves and stems)
8 leaves lacinato kale (de-stemmed and sliced into ribbons)
1 cup bulgur wheat (cooked according to package directions)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the parsley well, and then place the leaves and stems into the bowl of a food processor and pulse a few times.
Wash the kale well and de-stem. Add the kale and mint to the bowl as well, and pulse until everything is chopped to bite-sized pieces
Add diced tomatoes, chickpeas, and the cooked and cooled bulgur to the bowl and toss to combine the salad.
